name: Those Darn Millennials
description:
Those Darn Millennials  is hard-hitting social satire disguised is a silly little physics simulation game about creating avocado smash, and the woes of repaying a home loan.

The game is played entirely using the mouse, 

M1: Click and drag to pick up and move objects.

Scroll Wheel: While holding, scroll back and forth to bring the object closer to and further away from the player's face.
